title: patch 7.3 HUGE FPS DROPS
body:
after patch 7.3 got reales i got rly huge fps drops later into the game in team fight
before i had all on max in setting and i was around 120-140 fps and minimaly 75 in team fight
now even i put setting on very low its still fps dropping game is not running fluently
anyone can help?

replies.body:
Drops in frame rate could be caused by a few different factors such as game files acting up after the update. Let's go through and be sure that all of your graphics drivers are up to date, and also check out the other steps in our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

If that doesn't work, feel free to hit me back up!
